alert.note: Alert for Bradley; McMinn (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 3:52PM CDT until June 05 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bradley County in east Tennessee... McMinn County in east Tennessee... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 452 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Athens, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Etowah, Charleston, Englewood, Niota, Calhoun, Riceville, Clear Water and Dentville. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 30 and 53. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
